jobs_description.title: University Institute of Technology (IUT)
jobs_description.description: First year in Dijon (21) and second year in Troyes (10). Web development courses, graphic production, and communication strategy mainly. Aiming to specialize in web development.

jobs_description.title: Lycée Camille Claudel, Troyes (10)
jobs_description.description: Specialties in mathematics and social sciences with the expert mathematics option. Mentioned with honors (12.78 / 20)

projects.title: LPA Event
projects.description: LPA Event is the first professional project I completed. It is a showcase website developed with WordPress for a company specializing in event management. I was involved in every step of the site creation, from design mockups to integration, ensuring a smooth and responsive user experience that met the client’s needs.

projects.title: Agenda
projects.description: In this academic project, we created an interactive website to explore the influence of socio-demographic criteria on elections in France. I designed an original interface with interactive bubbles representing each criterion (income, age, gender, etc.), allowing users to navigate freely. This visual choice allowed me to stand out from classic presentations and strengthen my skills in web design and interactive development.

projects.title: Vibropolis
projects.description: Discover an essential tool for freelancers and businesses in Nicaragua. Our Payoneer Nicaragua Calculator allows you to accurately and quickly calculate fees and commissions when receiving international payments via Payoneer. Start using it today and take control of your finances!

projects.title: Results
projects.description: In this academic project, we created an interactive website to explore the influence of socio-demographic criteria on elections in France. I designed an original interface with interactive bubbles representing each criterion (income, age, gender, etc.), allowing users to navigate freely. This visual choice allowed me to stand out from classic presentations and strengthen my skills in web design and interactive development.

projects.title: PokeWorld
projects.description: This personal project was created to practice using APIs with the Vue.js framework and Tailwind CSS. It is an app that displays detailed Pokémon cards by fetching data from an external API. I added a feature to mark Pokémon as favorites and find them in a dedicated section.

projects.title: Utopia
projects.description:
I recreated the website of an existing cinema, Utopia in Pont-Sainte-Marie. First, I analyzed the site to identify its strengths and weaknesses. I then conducted a competitor study and proposed a graphic charter including the logo and visual identity.

After imagining the site structure, I designed an interactive mockup using Figma.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Currently at IUT Troyes, I am looking for an apprenticeship for my third and final year.
about.description: I am passionate about web development and website creation. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow in this field.

contact.title: Ready to bring your ideas to life?
contact.subtitle: I can boost your project or join your team.
